name: Staltus Dragonbane
aura: Increase Ally  in in all Battles by 30

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. If the target is under any debuff, each hit decreases the target's Turn Meter by 10%.
skills.name: Axe of Glory

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Drakehunter Tactics
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 3 turns, then attacks all enemies. 

Has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease C. DMG] debuff for 2 turns on enemies whose ATK is higher than their DEF. 

Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns on enemies whose ATK is equal to or lower than their DEF.
skills.name: Dragon Heart
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Whenever an enemy attempts to place a [Weaken] debuff, a [Decrease DEF] debuff, or a [Poison] debuff on this Champion, reflects them back onto the attacker. 

Damage increases by 5% for each debuff on the target.
skills.name: Untarnished [P]
